recipes.title: Beer Ham
recipes.excerpt: Tender, juicy ham slow-cooked with beer for rich flavor.
recipes.introduction:
A ham that enjoys a beer before hitting the oven? That’s already a win. This recipe delivers juicy meat and a flavorful sauce with minimal effort.

It fills the house with comforting aromas while the oven does the heavy lifting.

instructions.title: Prep
instructions.content: Preheat oven to 180°C and place ham in a roasting dish.

instructions.title: Add beer
instructions.content: Pour beer around the ham for gentle cooking.

instructions.title: Glaze
instructions.content: Mix mustard and honey and brush over ham.

instructions.title: Cook
instructions.content: Cover and bake for about 2 hours, basting occasionally.
